scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.docker:build: docker build --target PRODUCTION -f Dockerfile --label "org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=${githubsha}" --label "org.opencontainers.image.url=$(git remote get-url origin)" -t 25_s3_monitor .
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:build && docker run -p 8000:8000 --volume /Users/${USER}/.aws:/root/.aws --env AWS_PROFILE=${AWS_PROFILE} --rm -it --name 25_s3_monitor 25_s3_monitor
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker build --no-cache --target PRODUCTION -f Dockerfile --label "org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=${githubsha}" --label "org.opencontainers.image.url=$(git remote get-url origin)" -t 25_s3_monitor .
